/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and cars, creating a dynamic tableau of city life. The buildings, predominantly white and beige, rise in varying heights, adding depth and dimension to the scene. Cars of different colors are scattered along the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. In the distance, trees can be seen, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
